author: jdcasey
msg: [SUREFIRE-571] Put off instantiation of the Runner instance for a JUnit4TestSet instance until that test set is executed, to prevent static initialization of classes not currently being executed.

author: dougsale
msg: fixed mailing list links - should be '@' (with whitespace), not 'at'

author: eglynn
msg: [CXF-2407] Patch applied on behalf of Dan Ryazansky, with thanks.

author: mrglavas
msg: Reduce code duplication. The only difference in all of the overriden createDocument() methods was the Document node class we create. That is all we need to override. The rest of the code can live in the base class.
